name: Nurse story: Tricky Puzzle
description:
Welcome to Nurse story: Tricky Puzzle
Nurse story: Tricky Puzzle is a new addictive brain game. Where you choose the answer to order or not to solve the puzzle! Your task is to drag the objects to complete the picture according to logic. Try to reach the last level to complete all the stories of Brain Out game and develop your IQ and brain skills

Fun and exciting game
In Brain Games, each level is a little story with some mistakes and you need to use your brain to fix it.
Stunning graphics
Colorful pictures will delight your imagination!
Combine test and explore your brain with a unique brain challenge! brain training puzzle game etc. Have all the games you want. Your finger is the key to unraveling the hidden things behind the screen.
Fun for all ages: The best quiz game for family and friends gatherings!
Play one of the most downloaded and played brain training games.
Logic games, brain quizzes and IQ games.

Dare to challenge us?
Get ready for new mind-blowing puzzles! Fascinating puzzles that will surely surprise you: WOW! Great!

Have fun with your friends with this addictive and fun free IQ game! Come and see brain puzzle games that can keep you entertained!

Download Nurse story: Tricky Puzzle to solve funny puzzles and challenge your brain right now
